dcterms:creator: S. Reddy
D. Chen
C. Manning
dcterms:description: CoQAR is a corpus containing 4.5K conversations from the Conversational Question-Answering dataset CoQA, with 53K follow-up question-answer pairs. Each original question is annotated with at least 2 and at most 3 out-of-context rewritings.
dcterms:title: CoQAR

dcterms:creator: S. Reddy
D. Chen
C. Manning
dcterms:description: CoQA is a Conversational Question Answering dataset that contains 8k conversations, summing up to 127k questions with answers, produced by two human annotators.
dcterms:title: CoQA

dcterms:creator: A. Elgohary
D. Peskov
J. Boyd-Graber
dcterms:description: CANARD is a dataset created by manually annotating a subset of QuAC, where each question is associated with one single out-of-context rewriting.
dcterms:title: CANARD

dcterms:creator: E. Choi
H. He
M. Iyyer
M. Yatskar
W. Yih
Y. Choi
P. Liang
L. Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: QuAC is a dataset for Question Answering in Context, where dialogues are produced by two crowd workers and answers are spans extracted from a given piece of text.
dcterms:title: QuAC

dcterms:description: QQP (Quora Question Pairs) is a dataset originally proposed as a Kaggle challenge to detect duplicate questions from Quora, a collaborative QA website.
dcterms:title: QQP (Quora Question Pairs)

dcterms:creator: P. Rajpurkar
J. Zhang
K. Lopyrev
P. Liang
dcterms:description: SQuAD is a dataset containing over 100,000 questions for machine comprehension of text, designed for evaluating reading comprehension systems.
dcterms:title: SQuAD
